feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.89
entry.content:
Note: Docker image is only at ghcr.io (GitHub) and Docker Hub (wekanteam/wekan).
Quay.io is at read only mode, they are fixing something, so it's not possible to push Docker image yet to quay.io .

This release adds the following new features:

  • Add email notifications language localization feature. Thanks to Adamsss001.

and adds the following updates:

  • Added script to build snap locally and push to snapcraft.io candidate and edge. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated Browser Compatibility Matrix by adding Servo. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated Caddy docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • Upgraded to MongoDB 6.0.23 at Snap Candidate. Thanks to MongoDB developers.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix list insertion order and prevent runtime error in "Add After" feature. Thanks to valhalla-creator.
  • Add missing code of fix insertion order of list. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fix: Add CSS vendor prefixes for user-select and text-size-adjust for better browser compatibility. Thanks to oussama-madimagh.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.90
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix Due Date Problem in Non-English Numbers. Thanks to valhalla-creator.
  • Added missing quotes to Fix Due Date Problem in Non-English Numbers. Thanks to xet7.
  • Changed start.bat default ROOT_URL=http://localhost , although it only works for local user. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fix Lines in multiline markdown code block to not anymore have darker background. Thanks to mueller-ma and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.91
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Updated Docker build push action. Thanks to dependabot.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Reverted due date fixes. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.92
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Updated Docker build push action. Thanks to dependabot.
  • Updated to MongoDB 6.0.24 at Snap Candidate. Thanks to MongoDB developers.
  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to developers of dependencies.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Allow selection of card text via webkit/user-select attributes. Thanks to walster001.
  • Helm Chart: Fix: quote host names. Thanks to Atry.
  • Fix: properly document /users/login API. Thanks to Atry.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.93
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Enhance API documentation and add board-related endpoints. Thanks to Atry.
  • Snap Candidate: If CPU does not support AVX, use Qemu that supports AVX, so that MongoDB 6 works. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3. Thanks to xet7.
  • Added docs about using MongoDB at unsupported CPUs with Qemu. Thanks to xet7.
  • Helm Chart: Add podAnnotations support. Thanks to adalinesimonian.
  • Added release script to switch between using kvm, snapcraft.io/multipass, waydroid and virtualbox. Thanks to xet7.
  • Add a REST API endpoint to retrieve a card by ID. Thanks to Atry.
  • Avoid calling ReactiveCache.getCard twice. Thanks to Atry.
  • Add REST API endpoint to edit a list with various properties. Thanks to Atry.

and adds the following major updates to links of WeKan websites, blog and docs:

  • These changes are because most people at Finland expect Finnish company to be at .fi domain.
  • It did take too much time at local computer shop to explain about domain being .team
  • Most content have been moved to wekan.fi . For app stores https://wekan.fi/app/ there is still wekan.team used for app.
  • Many wikis and images from wekan.github.io have been moved to wekan repo docs directory
  • Pull requests welcome to fix any broken links at docs directory, and organizing docs/Features and their screenshots to subdirectories of each feature.
  • Updated issue template about pull requests for fixes to docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • wekan.team to wekan.fi. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to xet7.
  • Moved images from wekan.github.io to repo wekan/docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • [wekan.github.io to wekan.fi, and blog.wekan.team to wekan.fi/blog](https://github.com/wekan/wekan/commit/89480b61ce98d5a344108ad7c2ce9b3577fd3d7e> Thanks to xet7.
  • Update Browser-compatibility-matrix.md about Servo, uWolf, TUI webbrowsers, Chawan and Elinks. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated links, after moving many wikis to wekan repo docs directory: Part 1: Updated docs, Part 2: Removed footer, Part 3: Moved content from Home.md to README.md, Part 4: Updated links at readme, Part 5: Updated deep dive link, Part 6: Fixed links, Part 7: Updated links, Part 8: Reorganized docs file locations, Part 9: Fix Discord image link and WeKan API link, Part 10: Fix links about docs that were moved from wiki to readme, Part 11: Updated building Snap, Part 12: Updated Snap platforms setting, Part 13: Fix link to image about PWA app icon install. Thanks to stevenroose and xet7, Part 14: Formatting, Part 15: Removed old link Test Edge from docs index, Part 16: Fix link to image at docs, Part 17: Fixed not working link, Part 18: Added most often used links, Part 19: Update info about hashing, Part 20: Updated docs about Kubernetes, Part 21: Removed not working link from docs, Part 22: Fix docs link about CSV. Part 1, Part 23: Fix docs link about CSV. Part 2, Part 24: Updated docs about importing from Trello. Part 1, Part 25: Updated docs about importing from Trello. Part 2, Part 26: Updated docs about importing from Trello. Part 3, Part 27: Updated docs about importing from Asana, Part 28: Updated docs about migrating manually. Part 1, Part 29: Updated docs about migrating manually. Part 2, Part 30: Updated docs, Part 31: Updated Azure link, Part 32: Updated Keycloak link, Part 33: Updated image links at Azure docs, Part 34: Updated Python docs. Thanks to xet7.

and adds the following updates:

  • Updated dependencies. Thanks to developers of dependencies.
  • Upgraded Snap Candidate to have base core24, MongoDB 7 and Caddy 2. Thanks to xet7.
  • Removed old broken not used snap configuration files. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated release website script.
    Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • CleanDark Theme Fixes. Thanks to walster001.
  • Specify meteor version, otherwise the latest meteor version is not compatible with node14. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to dassio and xet7.
  • Reorganized docs to fix building WeKan. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fixed rebuild-wekan.sh install deps for macOS. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fixed release script of building Snap locally at Ubuntu. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fix: Correct return type in API documentation for Custom Fields. Thanks to Atry.
  • Fixed Snap local build script. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fixed building Docker image. Pushed new Docker image to Docker Hub, Quay and GitHub. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
